Apps by xarantolus

A repo that contains all apps by xarantolus.

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xarantolus/fdroid/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
08 08 98 AE 43 09 AE CE B5 89 15 E4 3A 4B 7C 4A 3E 2C DA 40 C9 17 38 E2 C0 2F 58 33 9A B2 FB D7
